# Science Mom (science.mom)

Science Mom & Math Dad create online science and math courses for homeschool families, plus hands-on activities and free resources.

## Start here
- About: https://science.mom/about/
- Start here: https://science.mom/start/
- Free resources: https://science.mom/free/
- Activities: https://science.mom/activities/

## Courses & support
- Courses: https://sciencemom.teachable.com  (will move to https://courses.science.mom later)
- Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/sciencemom
- Contact: https://science.mom/contact/
